synopsis.text: In a world where humans and spirits coexist, spirits have a much longer lifespan than humans. This means spirits often lose their human loved ones to old age and death. Even if the human is reborn, they lose the memories of their past life with the spirit. However, there exists a special service provided by "Fox Spirit Matchmakers" who can revive a human's old memories so they can reunite with their spirit lover. The story follows a young, aspiring matchmaker fox spirit named Tushan Susu. Despite her enthusiasm, she struggles to properly do her job as a matchmaker. One day, she meets Bai Yuechu, a powerful human taoist looking to free himself from an oppressive governing group. After literally falling into his life, Tushan Susu convinces Bai Yuechu to help her bring back the lost memories of Li Xueyang, a human who was once the lover of the spirit prince Fan Yun Fei before dying and reincarnating without her memories. However, Li Xueyang herself and other forces seem resistant to the two being reunited. As Tushan Susu and Bai Yuechu work together, they learn more about themselves and their past lives while trying to overcome obstacles in order to reunite the star-crossed spirit and human lovers.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
